He is taller than me.

column2: 这栋房子比他们的房子大。

column1: He is stronger now than he was.
She is smarter than him in math.
column2: 她在数学方面比他聪明。

column1: It is more beautiful than the picture.

column2: 今天的食物比昨天美味。

column1: He works harder than anyone else.
She speaks clearer than before.
It is more expensive than I expected.

column2: 这本书比上一本书更有趣。

column1: The movie is funnier than the first one.
column2: 这部电影比第一部搞笑。

column1: He is more careful than his brother.
